title: What are some ideas for making an invention of new things? - Quora

response.answer_text: I have several registered inventions. The point is to define what is needed and then search for a decision of how to make it real. You look for if anyone had solved the problem before. If no one did, you continue. If there are decisions, you look for how to improve. You study all the scientific and technological literature on the topic, you find the decision. Then you define what materials and all of the stuff you need. You make a prototype if necessary and solve all of the problems which you could not predict. Then you see if your decision is economically efficient. If everything is OK, you go and describe your invention in order to register it.

There have been various fields improving drastically. All the innovative ideas circle around wearables and machine learning. But don't you think something important hasn't evolved much in ages? I talk about the helmet. In India about 23.2% of the accidents are bike accidents. The few main reasons behind it are———— 1] drunken drive 2] vehicle out of shape 3] blind spots 4] bad mood of the driver 5] in incidents where bike is stolen 6] avoiding the use of helmet There can be alcohol sensors which test the driver before start. The bike should start only after the person wears the helmet. There must be V2X communications and cautions provided to the driver. There must be use of biometrics to start the bike. There must be informations of the bike provided to the driver. There can be a camera which detects the mood of the rider and shows higher speeds in the speedometer. Eg: In case rider is angry-10%increase. {From the speed to be shown in speedometer} In normal conduits-proper speed
